sentences.en: Are there enough shelves to accommodate all our books?
sentences.cn: 有足够的书架容纳我们所有的书 吗 ?

sentences.en: He bought a huge house to accommodate his library.
sentences.cn: 他买了一座大房子来放他的藏书。

sentences.en: Her eyes took a while to accommodate to the darkness.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛过了一会儿才适应黑暗。

sentences.en: I guess this hall to accommodate 1 , 000 persons.
sentences.cn: 我猜这个大厅能容纳1000人.

sentences.en: She walked slowly to accommodate herself to his pace.
sentences.cn: 她走得很慢，以便与他保持一致的步伐。

sentences.en: Some animal and plant species cannot accommodate to the rapidly changing cond-itions.
sentences.cn: 某些种类的动植物不能适应迅速变化的环境。

sentences.en: The eye can accommodate itself to seeing objects at different distances.
sentences.cn: 眼睛能自动调节以便观看远近不同的景物.
这家旅馆可供600位来宾住宿.

sentences.en: The hotel can accommodate up to 500 guests.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆可供500位旅客住宿。

sentences.en: The island was used to accommodate child refugees.
sentences.cn: 该岛用于收容儿童难民。

sentences.en: The roads are built to accommodate gradual temperature changes.
sentences.cn: 修建这些道路时考虑到了温度的逐渐变化。

sentences.en: The runway of this airport is undergoing expansion to accommodate large planes.
sentences.cn: 这个机场的跑道正在扩建以适应大型飞机起落.

sentences.en: The school in Poldown was not big enough to accommodate all the children.
sentences.cn: 波尔登的学校不够大，容不下所有的孩子。

sentences.en: There is usually room to accommodate up to 80 visitors.
sentences.cn: 那里通常可以住得下80位来客。

sentences.en: This big room can accommodate six beds.
This restaurant can accommodate two hundred people at a time.
sentences.cn: 这家餐馆可供200人同时用餐.

sentences.en: You should soon accommodate yourself to the new circumstance.

住处，膳宿；调节；和解；预订铺位
调解人；适应者；提供方便者
使适应；调节（accommodate的ing形式）；调解

trans.tran_cn: 容纳，接纳，为…提供住宿，顾及，考虑到，给…提供方便，迎合，适应
trans.tran_en: if a room, building etc can accommodate a particular number of people or things, it has enough space for them

trans.tran_en: if a room, building etc can accommodate a particular number of people or things, it has enough space for them
